wikipedia_page.main: William Rodney Forrester-Wood   (25 June 1902 – 6 April 1960) was a noted British surgeon and philatelist who was an expert on the postal history of Sarawak. In 1959, he was awarded the Crawford Medal by the Royal Philatelic Society London for his work The Stamps and Postal History of Sarawak. He specialised in children's and thoracic surgery.
